articles.author: Justin Low
articles.title: US-China deal reportedly does not cover de minimis exemption for e-commerce shipments - Forexlive | Forex News, Technical Analysis & Trading Tools
articles.description: The de minimis exemption is a rule which allowed for certain e-commerce shipments of goods at $800 or less to enter duty-free. The $800 is the threshold amount so to speak.
articles.content:

articles.title: How Big Tech is pitting Washington against California - Politico
articles.description: Tech giants plan to use their Trump-era lobbying muscle to head off state AI regulations. But can they agree on what they want from Washington?
articles.content:
Their effort puts the companies in the unusual position of supporting federal regulation on the fast-moving technology, which they have so far managed to stave off almost entirely.
